alert.note: Alert for Cass; Douglas; Lancaster; Saline; Sarpy; Saunders; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong winds of 40 to 50 mph will impact portions of northwestern Mills, Pottawattamie, southeastern Harrison, southern Shelby, Sarpy, Lancaster, Seward, southeastern Douglas, northern Saline, southern Saunders and northwestern Cass Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Audubon to near Elkhorn to 2 miles west of Utica. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong winds will reach... Zorinsky Lake around 630 PM CDT. Gretna, Millard, Wehrspann Lake and Chalco around 635 PM CDT. Beaver Crossing and Prairie Queen Recreation Area around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these winds include Springfield, Cordova, Friend, Cedar Creek, Louisville, Murdock and Elmwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 35 and 63. Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 1 and 48. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 366 and 454. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Iowa...and southeastern and east central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Douglas; Lancaster; Saline; Sarpy; Saunders; Seward
